schema.description: 智能接入网关实例所属地域ID。

400.errorMessage: The specified SAG instance does not exist.
The specified SAG Software instance does not support this feature.
The specified SAG instance has not been activated.

403.errorMessage: The specified smart access gateway instance id is invalid.
The specified smart access gateway is not online.
The specified smart access gateway has not bound CCN; please bind CCN first.
The current edition of the smart access gateway does not support this feature.

500.errorMessage: The specified Smart Access Gateway is being upgraded.

title: 切换智能接入网关的接入点
summary: 切换智能接入网关的接入点。
description: 在您调用本接口前，请先调用[ListAccessPoints](~~183876~~)接口查看目标实例可以切换的接入点信息。
